q:
If you are required to execute the following jQuery code, then which of the following statements about its output is correct:

Code

<html lang="en"> 
    <body> 
        <span>Welcome</span> 
        <span>to</span>
        <span>jQuery</span> 
        <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.2/jquery.min.js">
        </script>
        <script> alert(jQuery('span').text());
        </script> 
    </body> 
</html>

a.option: An alert box will be displayed with the text 'Welcome' in it
An alert box will be displayed with the text 'jQuery' in it
An alert box will be displayed with the text 'WelcometojQuery' in it
An alert box will be displayed with the text 'Welcome to jQuery' in it
